## OnRendererContextLost class

Emitted the renderer context is lost due to e.g. resource contention. Emitted on both chart and plots.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class OnRendererContextLost implements TRendererOnContextLost 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [TRendererOnContextLost](./core.trendereroncontextlost.md)
